AlphaBanner.bannerText: This is a new service - your <url>feedback</url> will help us to improve it.

main.title: Build and run online services easily
main.description: Use this design system to make your service consistent with gov.ie. Learn from the research and experience of other service teams and avoid repeating work that’s already been done.
main.secondaryTitle: What GOV.IE Digital Service Platform offers
main.secondaryP1: Your users can complete a form, send you information, pay for things and receive notifications with GOV.IE Digital Service Platform. It's low cost, easy to set up and has accessibility built in from the start.
main.secondaryP2: You can use one, some, or all of the digital tools to support your service.

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: Empower your public sector department with a robust payment system designed to streamline financial transactions securely and efficiently.Payments Building Block is secure and Payment Card Industry (PCI) compliant. Revolutionise the way you manage payments and elevate the experience for civil servants and citizens with Payments Building Block today.

messaging.title: Messaging
messaging.description: Integrate Messaging, the centralised platform for all-inclusive communication solution tailored for public sector entities, to streamline interactions with citizens.

designSystem.title: Design System
designSystem.description: Make your service look like gov.ie with guides for applying layout, typography, colour and images.Make your service look like gov.ie with guides for applying layout, typography, colour and images.

forms.title: Forms
forms.description: Enhance your public sector department's operations with FormsIE, a comprehensive solution tailored for crafting and handling online forms.

advantages.title: Why use GOV.IE Digital Service Platform
advantages.description: GOV.IE Digital Service Platform is provided by the Government Digital Service (GDS).

noProcurement.title: No procurement
noProcurement.description: As a Government owned product, there is no need for lengthy times procuring us as a supplier

noCode.title: No code
noCode.description: All our tools offer solutions that can be implemented with no technical knowledge

lowCost.title: Low cost
lowCost.description: Our tools are competitively priced against other software on the market

accessible.title: Accessible
accessible.description: All our tools are fully accessible for both civil servants and end users

trustedExperience.title: Trusted experience
trustedExperience.description: Put your users at ease with government branded comms and familiar GOV.IE styles

test.title: Test before you launch
test.description: Quickly test your ideas for your service before you build it, saving time and money and reducing risk

footer.title: The Building Blocks
footer.descriptionP1: Your users can complete a form, send you information, pay for things and receive notifications with GOV.IE Digital Service Platform. It's low cost, easy to set up and has accessibility built in from the start.
footer.descriptionP2: You can use one, some, or all of the digital tools to support your service.
